title: Honorlock
text: is an on-demand proctoring service combining AI and live proctor pop-ins to ensure test integrity and enhance the testing process.
featureText: Honorlock is a leading online proctoring solution designed for secure and fair exams in remote learning settings. It leverages AI, live monitoring, and comprehensive support to uphold academic integrity, seamlessly integrating with learning management systems for ease of use.

features.title: Real-time proctoring
features.text: Utilizes live proctors and AI to monitor exams, ensuring academic integrity by detecting and addressing possible cheating incidents as they happen.

features.title: Browser lockdown
features.text: Features secure browser technology to prevent access to unauthorized websites and tools during tests, enhancing the reliability of the testing environment.

features.title: 24/7 support
features.text: Offers round-the-clock support for both students and faculty, ensuring that any issues can be promptly resolved, minimizing stress and technical difficulties during exams.
